subSections.title: Definitions
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=佢,渠,夷-Wu}}
From {{ltc-l|渠|he; she; it}}.

In Southern Sixian Hakka: {{IPAchar|/ki/}} → {{IPAchar|/i/}}.

In Wu ({{zh-ref|You, 1995}}): {{IPAchar|/ɡ-/}} → {{IPAchar|/dʑ-/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɦ-/}} ( → {{IPAchar|/ʔ-/}}).
